LAST SYNCED: No Photos No Entries View photos captured from your
visits and entries. Manage, edit and submit entries. Upgrade to Use this Feature This feature is not available on your current subscription. To avail this feature, simply upgrade by contacting Tarkie. SELECT STORE Location Services Please enable GPS satellites and Google's location service to continue. Mock Location Your mock location is turned on. Please turn it off first to continue using Tarkie. Time Unknown It seems that your device time has been reset or was not properly shutdown. You are required to validate the server time via Internet/GPS. No GPS Signal Searching for GPS Signal. Please try going outside. Validating Date and Time Server Time: Date & Time Security Refresh Date & Time We have detected a discrepancy between server and your device time. Please change the device time to "Server Time" to continue. Permissions Required Please enable the required permissions to continue. GPS Acquired GPS has been acquired, do you want to use this coordinates? No GPS Signal Unfortunately, your device is still unable to get GPS signal. Confirm Logout Are you sure you want to logout? Please connect to the internet. No data to be synced. Please time-in first before taking your break. You don't have available breaks. Camera Failed Unable to load camera, please try to restart your device and try again. 0h Incomplete Details You have incomplete details in this form. Please make sure to fill out all required * fields. Discard this entry? You will lose your work and you will have to start over. Delete this entry? Are you sure you want to delete this entry? delete this expense?

Location Acquired Signature Captured Date & Time Captured Time-in Required Please time-in first before creating new entries. To time-in, please tap on Menu or slide to the right and select 'Time-in'. Please time-in first before you check-in. Check-in Required Please check-in first before filling up forms. You are checking-out at Please choose the status
of your visit: Currently Checked-in You are currently checked-in at $title. Please check-out first before ending your day. Please time-in first before creating new entries.
